package swagpackage; import org.openqa.selenium.By; import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver; import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeOptions; import org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.Select; public class Swaglabs { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver", "D:\\Selenium Class\\Selenium web driver\\Google Chrome\\chromedriver_win32\\chromedriver.exe"); ChromeOptions options = new ChromeOptions(); options.addArguments("--remote-allow-origins=*"); ChromeDriver driver = new ChromeDriver(options); // Launch Website driver.get("https://www.saucedemo.com"); // Login driver.findElement(By.id("user-name")).sendKeys("standard_user"); driver.findElement(By.id("password")).sendKeys("secret_sauce"); driver.findElement(By.xpath("//input[@name='login-button']")).click(); // Sort products low to high driver.findElement(By.cssSelector("product_sort_container")).click(); Select select = new Select(driver.findElement(By.name("product_sort_container"))); select.selectByIndex("lohi"); select.selectByVisibleText("Name (A to Z)"); select.selectByValue("Price (low to high"); //Add all item to cart driver.findElement(By.xpath("//input[@name='add-to-cart-sauce-labs-onesie']")).click(); driver.findElement(By.xpath("//input[@name='add-to-cart-sauce-labs-bike-light']")).click(); driver.findElement(By.xpath("//input[@name='add-to-cart-sauce-labs-bolt-t-shirt']")).click(); driver.findElement(By.xpath("//input[@name='add-to-cart-test.allthethings()-t-shirt-(red)']")).click(); driver.findElement(By.xpath("//input[@name='add-to-cart-sauce-labs-backpack']")).click(); driver.findElement(By.xpath("//input[@name='add-to-cart-sauce-labs-fleece-jacket']")).click(); //Go to cart page driver.findElement(By.cssSelector("shopping_cart_link")).click(); driver.findElement(By.xpath("//input[@name='remove-sauce-labs-bolt-t-shirt']")).click(); driver.findElement(By.xpath("//input[@name='remove-sauce-labs-bike-light']")).click(); //checkout button driver.findElement(By.xpath("//input[@name='checkout']")).click(); // details driver.findElement(By.id("first-name")).sendKeys("Keerthi"); driver.findElement(By.id("last-name")).sendKeys("Pratik"); driver.findElement(By.id("postal-code")).sendKeys("695588"); driver.findElement(By.xpath("//input[@name='continue']")).click(); driver.findElement(By.xpath("//input[@name='finish']")).click(); driver.findElement(By.xpath("//input[@name='back-to-products']")).click(); // log out driver.findElement(By.cssSelector("shopping_cart_container")).click(); driver.findElement(By.xpath("//input[@id='logout_sidebar_link']")).click(); } }
